author: Liturgist
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------
Get-Help about_Classes

Expected behavior
-----------------
Information about classes is presented.

Actual behavior
---------------
PS C:\Program Files\PowerShell\6.0.0-alpha.18> get-help about_Classes

Name                              Category  Module                    Synopsis
----                              --------  ------                    --------
about_Classes                     HelpFile                            Describes how you can use classes to develop in Windows PowerShell
about_Classes                     HelpFile                            SHORT DESCRIPTION

Environment data
----------------

```
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-alpha.18
PSVersion                      6.0.0-alpha
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
BuildVersion                   3.0.0.0
CLRVersion
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
WSManStackVersion              3.0
PSEdition                      Core

comments.author: mklement0
comments.body: I see the same symptom on Windows, but neither on Linux nor on macOS.

title: Get-Help about_Classes does not return help
